MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:47pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the overhead network located at Brackenlees farm and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:30pm on the 9th November 2020.
